pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulates ZINAR(1) Model and Estimates Its Parameters Under Frequentist Approach // Generates Realizations of First-Order Integer Valued Autoregressive Processes with Zero-Inflated Innovations (ZINAR(1)) and Estimates its Parameters as described in Garay et al. (2021) doi:10.1007/978-3-030-82110-4_2.
